card.name: CW01 — Enraptured Woodsman
card.text: Lifelink Enraptured Woodsman gets +1/+1 if you control an enchantment.

card.name: CW02 — Armont's Seeker
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more enchanted creatures attack, you gain 1 life.

card.name: CW03 — Vance's Squire
card.text: Vigilance Vance’s Squire has lifelink as long as you control another knight.

card.name: CW04 — Hylda's Apprentice
card.text: First strike Hylda’s Apprentice gets +1/+0 if you control an artifact or an enchantment. It gets +2/+0 instead if you control both.

card.name: CW05 — Relic Hunter's Familiar
card.text: Whenever a historic permanent you control enters, scry 2. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: CW06 — Hunting Eagle
card.text: Flying When Hunting Eagle enters, create a Food token.

card.name: CW07 — False Heir
card.text: When False Heir enters, create a Royal Role token attached to it. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.) Sacrifice an Aura: False Heir gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: CW08 — Inspiring Jouster
card.text: Inspiring Jouster gets +2/+0 if you control three or more creatures.

card.name: CW09 — Vance's Rally
card.text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance. Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.

card.name: CW10 — Seeker of Heroes
card.text: Flying When Seeker of Heroes enters, create a Young Hero role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)

card.name: CW11 — Graceful Giant
card.text: Graceful Giant costs {1} less to cast for each Aura you control. --- Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: CW12 — Eriette's Lullaby
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: CW13 — Rose's Erasure
card.text: When Rose’s Erasure enters, exile target creature until Rose’s Erasure leaves the battlefield. Create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token.

card.name: CW14 — Swift Baking
card.text: Create a Food token. Draw a card.

card.name: CW15 — Disenchantive Mentality
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

card.name: CU01 — Hunted Borrower
card.text: Flying --- Scry 1. Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: CU02 — Paradoxical Ghost
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, Paradoxical Ghost gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: CU03 — Pixie Prankster
card.text: Flying Pixie Prankster gets +1/+0 if you control another Faerie.

card.name: CU04 — Ticking Guards
card.text: Vigilance --- Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: CU05 — Balanced Eater
card.text: When Balanced Eater enters, if you control an artifact or an enchantment, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you control both, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

card.name: CU06 — Farsight Frog
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Farsight Frog.

card.name: CU07 — Talion's Warcaller
card.text: Flying When Talion’s Warcaller enters, create a 1/1 black Faerie enchantment creature token with flying.

card.name: CU08 — Scheming Giant
card.text: Scheming Giant costs {1} less to cast for each artifact or enchantment you control. --- Create a token copy of target artifact you control with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: CU09 — Grigog's Enhancement
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. If enchanted creature has a card type other than creature, it has flying.

card.name: CU10 — Adamant Negation
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, create a 0/2 blue Frog enchantment creature token.

card.name: CU11 — Guardian's Gauntlets
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {3}. This ability costs {2} less to activate if you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand this turn. --- Create a 0/2 blue Frog enchantment creature token.

card.name: CU12 — Unexplained Vision
card.text: Draw three cards. Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.

card.name: CU13 — Witness Frogification
card.text: Create a Cursed Role token attached to target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is 1/1.)

card.name: CU14 — Learned Disruption
card.text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Scry 1.

card.name: CU15 — Auric Sight
card.text: When Auric Sight enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card. 1U: Sacrifice Auric Sight.

card.name: CB03 — Poisoned Gingerwarrior
card.text: Deathtouch {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Poisoned Gingerwarrior: Target opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: CB02 — Accursed Faerie
card.text: Flying When Accursed Faerie enters, create a Cursed Role token attached to it. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is 1/1.)

card.name: CB01 — Herald of the Swarm
card.text: When Herald of the Swarm enters or dies, amass Rats 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.)

card.name: CB04 — High-Flying Trickster
card.text: Flying High-Flying Trickster can block only creatures with flying. --- Create a Food token.

card.name: CB05 — Charmed Vermin
card.text: Lifelink When Charmed Vermin enters, amass Rats 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.)

card.name: CB06 — Grounded Faeries
card.text: Menace When Grounded Faeries dies, Grounded Faeries deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.

card.name: CB07 — Faerie Overseer
card.text: Flying When Faerie Overseer enters, draw a card. You lose 1 life. When Faerie Overseer dies, create a Wicked Role token attached to target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)

card.name: CB08 — Skeril's Ratcaller
card.text: When Skeril’s Ratcaller enters, amass Rats 5. (Put five +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.)

card.name: CB09 — Deadly Giant
card.text: Deadly Giant costs {1} less for each noncreature card in your graveyard. --- Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: CB10 — Spiteful Strength
card.text: Enchanted creature gets +3/+1. When enchanted creature dies, Spiteful Strength deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: CB11 — Auric Fortitude
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature has deathtouch. When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.

card.name: CB12 — Armont's Sacrifice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or enchantment. Draw two cards.

card.name: CB13 — Oliver's Manipulation
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card with a noncreature card type. That player discards that card. You lose 1 life.

card.name: CB14 — Murderous Choice
card.text: Adamant — If three or more black mana was spent to cast this spell, you may pay 2 life. If you do, choose both instead. Choose one — • Destroy target creature. • Create two Cursed Role tokens attached to two different target creatures.

card.name: CB15 — Go for the Brain
card.text: Destroy target nonenchantment creature.

card.name: CR01 — Redcap Spearguard
card.text: First strike When Redcap Spearguard dies, amass Rats 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.)

card.name: CR02 — Eager Combatant
card.text: Haste --- First to the Fray deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: CR03 — Trebuchet Ramparts
card.text: Reach {T}: Trebuchet Ramparts deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: CR04 — Redcap Rummager
card.text: When Redcap Rummager enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: CR05 — Ratstalked Knight
card.text: Menace When Ratstalked Knight enters, amass Rats 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.) --- Destroy target artifact.

card.name: CR06 — Flamestriker Ogre
card.text: Whenever Flamestriker Ogre deals excess damage to a creature, it deals 1 damage to each opponent. --- Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

card.name: CR07 — Wildenrage Bull
card.text: Menace Wildenrage Bull’s power is equal to the number of non-Human creatures you control.

card.name: CR08 — Writhing Hulk
card.text: Trample When Writhing Hulk enters, amass Rats 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It’s also a Rat. If you don’t control one, create a 0/0 black Rat Army creature token first.) Creatures you control with power greater than their mana value have trample.

card.name: CR09 — Raging Giant
card.text: Raging Giant costs {1} less to cast for each counter on creatures you control. --- Raging Spark deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: CR10 — Sunfire Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. Sacrifice Sunfire Strength: Sunfire Strength deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: CR11 — Firesight
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Scry 2.

card.name: CR12 — Flick a Coin
card.text: Flick a Coin deals 1 damage to any target. You create a Treasure token. Draw a card.

card.name: CR13 — Paradoxical Might
card.text: When Paradoxical Might enters, draw a card. Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: CR14 — Burning Sight
card.text: When Burning Sight enters or leaves the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target. Sacrifice Burning Sight: Scry 1.

card.name: CR15 — Flames and Sparks
card.text: Flames and Sparks deals 6 damage to target creature and 1 damage to that creature’s controller. Adamant — If three or more red mana was spent to cast this spell, create a treasure token.

card.name: CG01 — Snake Cookie
card.text: Deathtouch {1}: Snake Cookie can’t be blocked this turn except by creatures with deathtouch. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Snake Cookie: You gain 3 life.

card.name: CG02 — Charmed Watchdogs
card.text: Vigilance Sacrifice an enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on Charmed Watchdogs. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: CG03 — Cursedblessed Elf
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: CG04 — Ginger Catcher
card.text: Reach Whenever a Food you control leaves the battlefield for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Ginger Catcher.

card.name: CG05 — Relic Hoarder
card.text: Whenever a historic permanent enters under your control, Relic Hoarder gets +1/+2 until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: CG06 — Wilden Elemental
card.text: Vigilance Whenever another non-Human creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Wilden Elemental.

card.name: CG07 — Gingerbread Thug
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbread Thug: You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: CG08 — Beastial Monarchist
card.text: When Beastial Monarchist enters, create a Royal Role token attached to another target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)

card.name: CG09 — Culinary Dreadmaw
card.text: Trample {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Culinary Dreadmaw: You gain 3 life.

card.name: CG10 — Wilden Giant
card.text: Wilden Giant costs {1} less to cast for each non-Human creature you control. --- Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: CG11 — Return to the Wilds
card.text: Choose two — • Search your library for a basic Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. • Create a 1/1 green Human enchantment creature token. • Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.

card.name: CG12 — Monstrous Bite
card.text: Create a Monster Role token attached to target creature you control, then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.)

card.name: CG13 — Auric Burst
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice an enchantment. Target creature gets +X/+1 until end of turn, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed enchantment’s mana value.

card.name: CG14 — Tendrils of Growth
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, add {G}.

card.name: CG15 — Commune with Nature
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: CA01 — Gingerbrute
card.text: {1}: Gingerbrute can’t be blocked this turn except by creatures with haste. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerbrute: You gain 3 life.

card.name: CC01 — Archon's Herald
card.text: When Archon’s Herald enters, scry 1. {4}, Sacrifice Archon’s Herald: Search your library for a card that transforms into an Archon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Spend only one color of mana to activate this ability.

card.name: CA02 — Clockwork Friend
card.text: --- Scry 3.

card.name: CA03 — Voidflower Stew
card.text: When Voidflower Stew enters, draw a card. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Voidflower Stew: Exile target permanent. You gain 3 life.

card.name: CA04 — Monolith of Heroics
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Add two mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Adventure spells.

card.name: CC02 — Questseek
card.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put a land card or a card with an Adventure from among them into your hand.
